scc_slot_t Struct Reference


Data Fields

uint64_t ownerid
uint32_t key_length
uint32_t slot
uint8_t * key
fsl_shw_return_t code

Detailed Description

Structure passed during user ioctl() calls to manage stored keys and stored-key slots.

Field Documentation

fsl_shw_return_t code

API return code from operation

uint8_t* key

User-memory pointer to key value

uint32_t key_length

Length of key

uint64_t ownerid

Owner's id to check/set permissions

uint32_t slot

Slot to operation on, or returned slot number.
